item.title: 报道称医疗保险奖金现在更难获得，Humana 下挫
item.description: 周二，Humana 公司股价下跌，因为有报道称，医疗保险健康计划获得奖金的标准似乎变得更具挑战性。【原文：Humana Inc. shares dropped Tuesday after reports suggested that criteria for Medicare health plans to earn bonus payments appeared to get more challenging.】

item.title: Meta 将斥资 1.4 亿美元使用黑森林实验室的人工智能图像技术
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司签署了一份价值超过 1 亿美元的多年期合同，使用人工智能图像初创公司 Black Forest Labs 的技术，这是该社交媒体公司为扩大其人工智能产品而进行的最新投资。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. has signed a multi-year contract worth more than $100 million to use technology from AI image startup Black Forest Labs, the latest investment by the social media firm to expand its artificial intelligence offerings.】

item.title: 摩根大通为夏威夷电力寻求垃圾债券交易
item.description: 据知情人士透露，摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. is holding meetings with investors over a possible high-yield bond sale for Hawaiian Electric Industries Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 施瓦布公司的阿吉拉尔说，大幅降息有可能吓到投资者
item.description: 查尔斯-施瓦布公司（Charles Schwab Corp）的奥马尔-阿吉拉尔（Omar Aguilar）认为，美联储下周降息四分之一点将是对金融资产最有利的情况，而更大幅度的降息则有可能引起投资者恐慌。【原文：A quarter-point interest-rate cut by the Federal Reserve next week would be the most favorable scenario for financial assets, with a deeper reduction running the risk of alarming investors, according to Charles Schwab Corp.’s Omar Aguilar.】

item.title: 美国 Altice 更换顾问重启债务重组谈判
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Altice USA Inc. 已更换顾问，希望重启与债权人的谈判，以减少其 260 亿美元的债务。【原文：Altice USA Inc. has switched advisers as it looks to revive talks with creditors to reduce its $26 billion debt pile, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 尽管面临政治阻力，法国银行仍认为经济将持续增长
item.description: 法国央行表示，尽管商界领袖们对动荡的政治局势表现出越来越多的不确定性，但法国经济第三季度仍有望保持0.3%的增长率。【原文：The French economy is on track to keep growing at 0.3% in the third quarter even as business leaders flag rising uncertainty over a volatile political situation, the country’s central bank said.】

item.title: 参议院法案草案放弃联邦关于人工智能公司测试期间的规定
item.description: 根据彭博新闻社（Bloomberg News）看到的一份法案草案，一位重要的共和党参议员正敦促在人工智能公司测试和开发其产品时，免除对这些公司的联邦监管。【原文：A key Republican senator is pressing to waive federal regulations for artificial intelligence companies while they test and develop their products, according to a draft of the bill viewed by Bloomberg News.】

item.title: CVC加入阿姆斯特丹AEX指数，主要股票增至30只
item.description: 随着阿姆斯特丹交易所运营商将荷兰蓝筹股指数的成员扩大到 30 只领先股票，CVC Capital Partners Plc 将被纳入该指数。【原文：CVC Capital Partners Plc will be added to the Dutch blue-chip index as Amsterdam’s exchange operator expands the membership of the gauge to 30 leading stocks.】

item.title: 苹果公司推出 iPhone 17 系列，包括更轻薄的 Air 机型
item.description: 苹果公司推出了 iPhone 17 机型，增加了全新的更轻薄的 Air 设计，并改进了标准版的摄像技术。【原文：Apple Inc. introduced its iPhone 17 models, adding an all-new skinnier Air design and improving the camera technology on its standard version.】

item.title: Mistral 成为欧洲人工智能竞争者最后也是最大的希望
item.description: ASML Holdings NV 对 Mistral 的 13 亿欧元投资为这家法国初创公司提供了宝贵的资金和信誉，因为它正努力打造欧洲的人工智能冠军。然而，Mistral 仍需证明，它能在一个由规模大得多的美国和中国竞争对手主导的行业中生存下来。【原文：ASML Holdings NV’s €1.3 billion investment in Mistral gives the French startup a valuable dose of capital and credibility as it seeks to build an artificial-intelligence champion for Europe. Yet Mistral still has to prove it can survive in an industry dominated by much larger American and Chinese competitors.】

item.title: 苹果公司推出具有高血压新功能和睡眠评分功能的手表
item.description: 苹果公司推出了其智能手表产品线三年来的首次端到端更新，首次推出了升级版 11 系列、Ultra 和 SE 型号。【原文：Apple Inc. rolled out the first end-to-end update to its smartwatch line in three years, debuting upgraded Series 11, Ultra and SE models.】

item.title: 花旗银行预计投资银行费用和市场将出现中个位数增长
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc. ）称，在市场动荡和交易活动复苏的背景下，其第三季度投资银行业务收费和交易收入均呈中个位数增长趋势。【原文：Citigroup Inc. said its third-quarter investment-banking fees and trading revenues are both trending up by percentage points in the mid-single digits, amid volatile markets and a resurgence of deal activity.】

item.title: 体育公园发起人因诈骗 2.8 亿美元债券入狱
item.description: 一对父子因误导 Vanguard Group Inc. 和 AllianceBernstein Holding LP 等公司关于亚利桑那州一个由 2.8 亿美元市政债券支持的体育场馆的前景而分别被判入狱多年。【原文：A father and son were each sentenced to years in prison for misleading firms like Vanguard Group Inc. and AllianceBernstein Holding LP about the prospects of an Arizona sports complex backed by $280 million in municipal bonds.】

item.title: 苹果首次推出 AirPods Pro 3，配备心率监测器，佩戴更舒适
item.description: 苹果公司推出了三年来第一款新的 AirPods Pro 型号，增加了新的健康追踪功能，改进了降噪功能，并且更加合身。【原文：Apple Inc. introduced its first new AirPods Pro model in three years, adding new health-tracking features, improved noise cancellation and a better fit.】

item.title: 美国称全球石油供应过剩已经开始，库存增加
item.description: 根据美国政府的一份报告，人们普遍预期的全球石油供应过剩现象已经开始，预计本季度的库存将出现膨胀。【原文：The widely anticipated global oil glut is already underway, with inventories expected to swell in the current quarter, according to a US government report.】

item.title: 戴蒙称美国经济在创纪录的 BLS 修正后正在走弱
item.description: 杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）表示，劳工统计局对美国薪资数据创纪录的修正进一步证明了美国经济正在与放缓作斗争。【原文：Jamie Dimon said the Bureau of Labor Statistics’ record revision to US payrolls data is further proof that the US economy is battling a slowdown.】

item.title: 秘鲁打赌能化解中美紧张局势，扩大出口市场
item.description: 秘鲁财政部长表示，秘鲁政府有信心获得美国和中国的青睐，因为安第斯国家的目标是进一步发展对外贸易，并从出口价格上涨中获益。【原文：Peru’s finance chief expressed confidence that his government can stay in the good graces of both the US and China as the Andean nation aims to further grow its foreign trade and benefit from higher export prices.】

item.title: 与空客、泰雷兹和莱昂纳多的欧洲航天合并谈判取得进展
item.description: 欧洲三家航空航天公司正在推进组建一家太空和卫星合资企业的计划，以便更好地与埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）主导的太空探索技术公司（SpaceX）竞争。【原文：A trio of European aerospace companies are moving ahead with plans to forge a space and satellite venture that can better compete with Elon Musk’s dominant SpaceX.】

item.title: 保险公司 Definity Financial 准备出售 10 亿加元债务
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Definity Financial Corp. 计划分两次出售约 10 亿加元（7.23 亿美元）的债务，以准备完成对 Travelers Canada 的收购。【原文：Definity Financial Corp. plans to sell around C$1 billion ($723 million) of debt in two parts as it prepares to close the acquisition of Travelers Canada, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧盟就碳排放额度展开会谈，以期就关键气候目标达成协议
item.description: 欧盟各国将讨论未来十年进口碳信用额作用的潜在变化，以推动就该集团具有里程碑意义的 2040 年气候目标迅速达成协议。【原文：European Union nations will discuss potential changes to the role of imported carbon credits in the next decade in a drive for a rapid deal on the bloc’s landmark 2040 climate goal.】

item.title: Silver Point、Redwood 通过出售 EchoStar 频谱获得回报
item.description: EchoStar 公司出售无线频谱的大手笔为包括 Silver Point Capital LP、Redwood Capital Management 和 Monarch Alternative Capital LP 在内的投资者带来了意外之财，他们与亿万富翁查理-厄根（Charlie Ergen）及其无线帝国的长期斗争终于有了回报。这些基金与亿万富翁查理-厄根（Charlie Ergen）及其无线帝国的长期斗争终于有了回报。【原文：EchoStar Corp.’s blockbuster sales of wireless spectrum deliver a windfall for investors including Silver Point Capital LP, Redwood Capital Management and Monarch Alternative Capital LP, whose long battle with billionaire Charlie Ergen and his wireless empire is finally paying off. For the funds, as many as three different winning trades are hitting at once.】

item.title: Cboe 计划为比特币和以太币提供 "连续 "期货合约
item.description: Cboe Global Markets 公司正在推动将加密货币中最具投机性的交易工具之一引入美国主流市场。该交易所表示，它计划于11月10日推出长期限版的永久比特币和以太币期货，但尚待监管部门批准。【原文：Cboe Global Markets Inc. is pushing to bring one of crypto’s most speculative trading tools into mainstream US markets. The exchange said it plans to launch long-dated versions of perpetual Bitcoin and Ether futures on Nov. 10, pending regulatory approval.】

item.title: 莱茵金属首席执行官计划 "一站式 "满足欧洲防务需求
item.description: 莱茵金属股份公司首席执行官表示，该公司正在采取一系列措施，将这家德国军火制造商转变为一站式服务供应商，以满足欧洲日益增长的国防需求。【原文：Rheinmetall AG is embarking on a raft of initiatives to transform the German arms manufacturer into a one-stop-shop to supply Europe with its growing defense requirements, its chief executive officer said.】

item.title: 苹果公司将在产品发布会上发布新款 iPhone
item.description: 纽约的苹果专卖店。摄影师：迈克尔-纳格尔/布鲁姆伯格【原文：The Apple store in New York. Photographer: Michael Nagle/Bloomberg】

item.title: 俄罗斯数据显示 8 月原油产量低于欧佩克+目标值
item.description: 俄罗斯 8 月份的原油产量低于 "欧佩克+"（OPEC+）的目标，此前该集团最近调整了补偿计划。【原文：Russia’s August crude output was below its OPEC+ target, following recent adjustments to the group’s compensation plans.】

item.title: 卖空公司 Culper 被指与贩毒集团有联系的公司起诉
item.description: 做空机构 Culper Research 因一篇报道被控诽谤，该报道称总部位于哥伦比亚的建筑玻璃制造商 Tecnoglass 公司与锡那罗亚贩毒集团的创始人有联系。【原文：Short seller Culper Research was sued for defamation over a report that alleged Tecnoglass Inc., a Colombia-based manufacturer of architectural glass, had links to the founders of the Sinaloa drug cartel.】

item.title: 加州正在商谈向瓦莱罗公司支付数亿美元以避免炼油厂停产
item.description: 加利福尼亚州的立法者正在考虑向瓦莱罗能源公司提供数亿美元，用于支付炼油厂的维护费用，以防止旧金山地区的一家燃料工厂关闭。【原文：California legislators are considering giving Valero Energy Corp. hundreds of millions of dollars to cover refinery maintenance costs in a bid to prevent the closure of a San Francisco-area fuel plant.】

item.title: 阿波罗的 Zelter 预测一些私募股权投资公司将面临 "洗牌 "解散
item.description: 阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.总裁吉姆-泽尔特（Jim Zelter）表示。【原文：The prolonged fundraising slowdown for private equity isn’t going to reverse course anytime soon and poses an existential crisis for certain firms, according to Apollo Global Management Inc. President Jim Zelter.】

item.title: 现在与一年前
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 微软命令员工每周三天返回办公室
item.description: 微软公司表示，许多员工很快就必须每周在办公室工作三天。【原文：Microsoft Corp. said many employees must soon work three days a week from an office.】
